This game has made me realize how absolutely brain dead I am. 11/10

With the familiar (from Portal 1) portal gun and a bunch of other elements (such as dispensers of blocks and liquids with various properties, as well as different types of beams) this game has all the elements a great puzzle game would need. Unfortunately, the focus seems to be action rather than puzzles (like Half Life without the guns, monsters and helicopters): Most of the puzzles are rudimentary and straightforward, usually requiring you to keep walking, or looking around vast spaces to find a spot to open a portal. Not many of them require you to use your head, though a handful are quite stimulating (especially towards the endgame). The world is a linear futuristic and unpleasant debris-ridden dystopia, not very enticing to explore in depth, although if you do you will be rewarded with funny secret areas. That said the characters whose chatter accompany the player are interesting and humorous, with nice voice acting, and the story is engaging.

TL;DR AT BOTTOM HOLY SHIT YOU WON'T WANT TO MISS IT
While portal 1 was very... I guess bland, this sequel offers much more content, and gives you a bit of a challenge. 
PROS:
-Aforementioned, gives a challenge while the level designs are thought out.
-Co-op is fun unless you have no idea what you're doing and you are just messing around and killing eachother for no reason
-"...when life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager!
Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man whose gonna burn your house down, with the lemons!” -Cave Johnson
-The destruction is on point, it's the only valve game that has very visible and distinguishable from others.
-Game isn't that demanding in terms of computer resources.
CONS:
-Lags with a potato PC that is basically a toaster.
-You might get sick from all the flying around.

Portal 1'den sonra hikayesi çok güzel devam ettirilmiş bence. Bölüm tasarımları ilk oyuna göre kat kat daha güzel. Hikayesi bir bölümden sonra biraz saçmalaşmaya başlıyor ama tekrar güzel bir yere bağlanıyor. Bulmacalarına da ilk oyuna göre bayağı çeşitlilik getirilmiş. Oynanış süresi de gayet yerinde. Co-op modu da eğer arkadaşınızla birlikte eğlenceli. Ayrıca co-op modundaki bulmacaların tamamı farklı ve 2 kişinin birlikte geçebilmesi için tasarlanmış. Alın oynayın keyifli vakit geçirin.

Эта игра - не просто головоломка и не просто ходилка. Это что-то особенное, доселе невиданное в игровой вселенной.

Фактически игра представляет из себя череду изолированных друг от друга уровней с заданиями, не выполнив которые, не пойдешь дальше. Собственно, задание каждый раз одно: пройти к выходу. Для выполнения заданий требуется сообразительность и трехмерное мышление. Используя заданный ландшафт и геометрию стен и определенные приспособления для перемещения, подпрыгивания и телепортации, активируя хитроумные механизмы и лазерные лучи - туннели, надо проложить себе дорогу в выходу из уровня. Вам противостоят роботы охранники, коварные ловушки и гравитация. Но особенно доставляет, что в игре есть секретки. Круто их искать (мне по крайней мере

Des trous, du puzzle, mais avec la possibilité de coop, ainsi que des maps de la communauté.
En vrai, je vais être honnête, je ne suis PAS DU TOUT un speedrunner. Encore moins un fan de l'univers Half-Life.
Mais dans le cas de la série de jeux Portal, j'ai accroché. J'aime ce genre de puzzle game, avec une logique aui au début est déroutante, mais au fur et à mesure que l'on joue, on progresse dans la gestion de l'espace.
J'ai bien aimé le premier du nom, mais le second, je trouve les puzzle encore plus malins et la courbe de difficulté est très bien gérée, même pour un néophyte du genre.
Pour les nouveau voulant tester des puzzle game, je considère que la série des Portal est un bon début.
Ensuite, nous avons le multi. Sah quel plaisir comme dirait certains.
Le fait de pouvoir jouer avec des potes, les balancer dans des piques, réfléchir à deux, les faire tomber à la flotter, faire des trics intéressants avec 4 portails, les détruire en leur balançant un laser à la gueule, ..., ouais, ça va, c'est rigolo.
Autre truc cool dans cet opus, les maps du workshop. Si on a envie de se creuser la tête, des gens nous ont fait des petites maps sympas, et ce, que ce soient des maps pour le solo ou des maps pour le coop !
Bref, foncez, n'hésitez-pas.
